title: Curriculum vitae
text:
Curriculum vitae
Reiner, Gerald, Prof. Dr. Dr. habil.
W2 Professor for Swine Diseases
CONTACT: Department for Veterinary Clinical Sciences, Clinic for Swine, Faculty of Veterinary Medicine, University of Giessen, Frankfurter Strasse 112, 35392 Giessen
Phone: +49 (0) 641 99 38820
Fax: +49 (0) 641 99 38829
E-Mail: gerald.reiner@vetmed.uni-giessen.de
Birth 09.09.1961
Gender Male
Academic Education
1981 - 1986 Study of Veterinary Medicine, University Giessen
1987 – 1999 Research Associate: Institute of Animal Breeding and Genetics, University of Giessen,
Head: Prof. Dr. V. Dzapo
1990 – 1991 Concurrently Research Associate, Department of Gynaecology, Obstetrics and
Andrology, University of Giessen, Head: Prof. Dr. B. Meinecke
1999 – 2001: Research Associate: Institute of Animal Breeding and Biotechnology, University of
Hohenheim, Head: Prof. Dr. H. Geldermann
Scientific Degrees
2006 European Diplomate for Porcine Health Management, Year of recognition: 2006
2006 Specialist for Swine Diseases
1994 - 1999 Animal Breeding and Genetics, Habilitation, Dr. habil. agr., University of Giessen,
Final year: 1999, Advisor/Mentor: Prof. Dr. V. Dzapo
1999 Specialist for Theriogenology and Biotechnology of Reproduction, Year of
recognition: 1999, Advisor: Prof. Dr. B. Meinecke

Prof. Dr. B. Meinecke

of oral exam: 1989, Thesis Advisors: Prof. Dr. V. Dzapo
Scientific Career
Since 2010 Second chairman of the Wildlife Biology Working Group of the University of Giessen

Diseases (C4)
